casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Fuller, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Fuller (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 108.]

(No. 97-2338 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided September 16, 1998.) Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Philip R. Cummings, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. David H. Bodiker, State Public Defender, and Kevin Fahey, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Rush (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 53, 697 N.E.2d 634.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
